articles.description: This wasn’t the first health scare or freak accident in Hollywood Week history, but it might have been the scariest yet.
articles.title: 'American Idol' singer’s frightening face-plant leaves judges, contestants, crew in shock - Yahoo Canada Sports

Claudia Conway, the 16-year-old daughter of former White House counselor Kellyanne Conway, auditions for ABC's 'American Idol.'

articles.description: During Monday's dramatic "American Idol," Claudia Conway took on a duet with a small-town country teen, and another contestant collapsed on stage.
articles.title: 'American Idol': Claudia Conway clashes with partner, other duet ends in hospitalization - USA TODAY

articles.content: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. is looking to shed nearly four per cent of its North American network starting with a deal to sell 49 stores in Oklahoma to Casey's General Stores Inc. for $39 million U… [+1977 chars]
articles.description: Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. is looking to shed nearly four per cent of its North American network starting with a deal to sell 49 stores in Oklahoma to Casey's General Stores Inc. for $39 million US.
articles.title: Couche-Tard sells 49 stores in Oklahoma to Casey's for $39M - CBC.ca

articles.author: Gil Kaufman
articles.content: It's pretty rare for someone to arrive on American Idol with a fully formed backstory that almost every viewer already knows. But then again, most aspiring Idols aren't the offspring of a former pres… [+735 chars]
articles.description: Claudia Conway's second appearance on American Idol on March 21 included a new look and some renewed confidence. Watch her performance and the judges' reactions.
articles.title: Claudia Conway Hits 'American Idol' Hollywood Week With a New Look, Attitude - Billboard
